property.name: filterPipelineRunsBaseQuery
property.value: SELECT r.run_id, r.pipeline_id, r.version, r.start_date, r.end_date, r.parameters, r.status, r.terminating, r.pod_id, r.node_type, r.node_disk, r.node_ip, r.node_id, r.node_name, r.node_image, r.node_cloud_region, r.docker_image, r.cmd_template, r.actual_cmd, r.timeout, r.owner, r.service_url, r.pod_ip, r.commit_status, r.last_change_commit_time, r.config_name, r.node_count, r.parent_id, r.entities_ids, r.is_spot, r.configuration_id, r.pod_status, r.prolonged_at_time, r.last_notification_time, r.last_idle_notification_time, r.exec_preferences, r.pretty_url, r.price_per_hour, r.state_reason, r.non_pause, r.node_real_disk, r.node_cloud_provider, r.tags, pipelines.pipeline_name FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r LEFT JOIN pipeline.pipeline pipelines ON (pipelines.pipeline_id = r.pipeline_id) WHERE @WHERE@ ORDER BY r.run_id DESC LIMIT :LIMIT OFFSET :OFFSET

property.name: countFilteredPipelineRunsBaseQuery
property.value: SELECT count(*) as count FROM pipeline.pipeline_run r LEFT JOIN pipeline.pipeline pipelines ON (pipelines.pipeline_id = r.pipeline_id) WHERE @WHERE@
